## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G06400](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G06400)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ARA-2, ARA2, ATRAB11E, ATRABA1A</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA RAB GTPASE HOMOLOG A1A
- **Description:**   Ras-related small GTP-binding family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
